meanings.definition: An assembly of people, especially for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The school meeting was held in the gymnasium.
meanings.sent2: Let's schedule a meeting to discuss the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The meeting of the minds between the two scientists led to a groundbreaking discovery.
meanings.sent4: The meeting of the rivers created a beautiful confluence of water.
meanings.sent5: The meeting of the book club members was filled with lively discussions.

meanings.definition: A gathering of people, especially for business, social, or religious purposes.
meanings.sent1: The family meeting at the park was a joyful occasion.
meanings.sent2: The annual company meeting will take place next week.
meanings.sent3: The meeting of old friends brought back cherished memories.
meanings.sent4: The meeting of cultures at the festival was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The meeting of the community members was a great opportunity to connect.

meanings.definition: A situation or occasion when two or more people come together.
meanings.sent1: The chance meeting of the long-lost friends was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected meeting in the park turned into a pleasant conversation.
meanings.sent3: The meeting of the rival teams on the field was intense.
meanings.sent4: The meeting of the sun and the horizon painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The meeting of the siblings after years apart was emotional.
